title: Not Too Late to Get This Beats Pill Speaker Under $100 at Prime Day Prices
description: Still time to bring home this portable pill speaker for 33% off to pump up the jams just about anywhere.
author: Brittany Vincent
excerpt: Still time to bring home this portable pill speaker for 33% off to pump up the jams just about anywhere.
text: If you’re looking for a way to enjoy your favorite tunes while on the move, this Beats Pill Bluetooth Speaker is the perfect companion. Whether you’re heading to the beach, having a picnic in the park, or just hanging out in your backyard, this portable speaker can serve up impressive sound wherever your adventures take you. See at Amazon Right now, you can snag the Beats Pill Bluetooth Speaker for just under $100, down from its original price of $150. That’s a 33% discount, saving you $50 – and the same price this speaker was available for during Prime Day. Now you don’t have to miss out on the deal just because the sale has come and gone. Pumped up, powerful sound anywhere The Beats Pill speaker is compact size and lightweight, so it’s easy to toss in your bag or backpack. But don’t let its small size fool you It still packs a punch when it comes to sound quality. It serves up clear, crisp sound with deep, rich bass. So whether you’re listening to your favorite playlist, catching up on a podcast, or streaming a movie, you’ll get seriously good audio. You can use the speaker to wirelessly stream music from your smartphone, tablet, or laptop too. No more fumbling with cords or cables. Just pair your device and start enjoying your tunes in seconds. And one of the best things about the Beats Pill is its long-lasting battery life. With up to 12 hours of continuous playback, you can keep the music going all day long. When you need to power up, the speaker’s USB charging port makes it easy to juice up on the go. The Beats Pill isn’t just about function, either. It’s also unique-looking, with a fun and modern design that’ll have heads turning whenever you decide to bust it out. And you’ll want to do so as often as you can. It looks just like the “pill” referenced in the title, after all. Whether you’re a music lover, a podcast fan, or just someone who appreciates great audio, the “pill” is an easy one to swallow. You’re going to want to grab it quick, though. Since this is a last-minute holdover Prime Day deal, you’ll have to check out with it soon before it jumps back up to its regular price. And if you’re going to make your world a little more musical, that’s something you’re going to want to do – super fast. See at Amazon
